title: Infuence Points are gone for Alpha

replies.body: I don't really see any IP that would end up missing on the account.  I see a stretch of champion and rune purchases for IP, as well as championship jewels.  If you have any concerns or would like more specifics, feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team can assist!
alright, now i can see my ip.. thanks a lot!... :)
And i really don't see my ip (not rp) in the alpha client, only in classic... :/
